category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Replaces the original captcha with reCAPTCHA

To use reCAPTCHA you need a public and a private key. You can get both free of cost. Please enter your private key in the textarea above. If you are using more than one domain you need to get a different key for each domain. The domain has to be entered together with the key, separated by a colon (:). Further domains can be added line by line. The domains must not contain "http://". Example:
www.domain1.com:private-key1
domain2.com:private-key2
www.domain.org:private-key3
…

To use reCAPTCHA you need a public and a private key. You can get both free of cost at reCAPTCHA.net. Please enter your public key in the textarea above. If you are using more than one domain you need to get a different key for each domain. The domain has to be entered together with the key, separated by a colon (:). Further domains can be added line by line. The domains must not contain "http://". Example:
www.domain1.com:public-key1
domain2.com:public-key2
www.domain.org:public-key3
…
Here you can choose between the predefined reCAPTCHA themes.
